n = int(input())
c = []
s = []
f = []
for i in range(n - 1):
    c_tmp, s_tmp, f_tmp = map(int, input().split())
    c.append(c_tmp)
    s.append(s_tmp)
    f.append(f_tmp)

for i in range(n):
    if i == n - 1:
        print(0)
        continue
    else:
        t = s[i]
        for j in range(i, n - 1):
            if t % f[j] == 0:
                t += c[j]
            else:
                t += f[j] - t % f[j] + c[j]
        print(t)

# 入力
N = int(input())
C = []
S = []
F = []
for i in range(N-1):
    c, s, f = map(int, input().split())
    C.append(c)
    S.append(s)
    F.append(f)

# 出力
for i in range(N):
    t = 0
    for j in range(i, N-1):
        if t < S[j]:
            t = S[j]
        else:
            t = t + F[j] - t % F[j]
        t += C[j]
    print(t)

import sys


def train():
    n = int(input())
    c = []
    s = []
    f = []
    for i in range(n - 1):
        c_tmp, s_tmp, f_tmp = map(int, input().split())
        c.append(c_tmp)
        s.append(s_tmp)
        f.append(f_tmp)

for i in range(n):
    if i == n - 1:
        print(0)
        continue
    elif i == 0:
        t = s[0]
        for j in range(n - 1):
            if t % f[j] == 0:
                t += c[j]
            else:
                t += f[j] - t % f[j] + c[j]
        print(t)
    else:
        t = s[i]
        for j in range(i, n - 1):
            if t % f[j] == 0:
                t += c[j]
            else:
                t += f[j] - t % f[j] + c[j]
        print(t)

# 入力
N = int(input())
C = [0]
S = [0]
F = [0]
for i in range(N-1):
    C.append(int(input().split()[0]))
    S.append(int(input().split()[1]))
    F.append(int(input().split()[2]))

# 出力
for i in range(N):
    t = 0
    for j in range(i, N-1):
        if t < S[j]:
            t = S[j]
        else:
            t = t + F[j] - t % F[j]
        t += C[j]
    print(t)

# 入力
N = int(input())
C = [0]
S = [0]
F = [0]
for i in range(N-1):
    c, s, f = map(int, input().split())
    C.append(c-1)
    S.append(s-1)
    F.append(f-1)

# 出力
for i in range(1, N):
    t = 0
    for j in range(i, N):
        if t < S[j]:
            t = S[j]
        else:
            t = t + F[j] - (t % F[j])
        t += C[j]
    print(t)

# 入力
N = int(input())
C = []
S = []
F = []
for i in range(N-1):
    c, s, f = map(int, input().split())  # c:コスト, s:発車時刻, f:発車間隔
    C.append(c)
    S.append(s)
    F.append(f)

# 出力
for i in range(N):
    t = 0
    for j in range(i, N-1):
        if t < S[j]:
            t = S[j]
        else:
            t = t + F[j] - t % F[j]
        t += C[j]
    print(t)
